penalty.description: Specifies the norm used in the penalization. The ‘l2’ penalty is the standard used in SVC. The ‘l1’ leads to coef_ vectors that are sparse.

loss.description: Specifies the loss function. ‘hinge’ is the standard SVM loss (used e.g. by the SVC class) while ‘squared_hinge’ is the square of the hinge loss.

dual.description: Select the algorithm to either solve the dual or primal optimization problem. Prefer dual=False when n_samples > n_features.

C.description: Penalty parameter C of the error term.
